problem.markdown:
1. At 0o crank angle of zero offset slider crank mechanism what is direction of angular velocity of connecting rod?
(x) Opposite of direction of crank rotation () Always clockwise () Always counterclockwise () Depends on link lengths
2. Velocity vector of slider is
() None of these (x) Parallel to the axis of slider () Perpendicular to axis of slider () At 45o to the axis of slider
3. For l/r ratio 2, when crank and connecting rod are making equal angle with +X axis what is the ratio of angular velocity of crank and connecting rod?
() 0.5 () None of these () 4 (x) 2
4. Direction of velocity of 5cm crank rotating at 3rpm (CW) ?
(x) Perpendicular to crank in the direction of rotation () Perpendicular to crank opposite to direction of rotation () Along the crank directed towards center () Along the crank away from the center
5. Direction of angular velocity of crank and connecting rod is same at which of the following positions of crank angles
(x) 120o () 0o () None of these () 60o
